name: lgmp.github.io
body:
### Welcome to LGMP's GitHub Pages...page.
This currently is an automatically generated page from an automatic page generator, isn't it beautiful? It was authored using GitHub Flavored Markdown, with a template crafted by a designer, and publish to GitHub.

### What is LGMP?
We're an independent studio that have many talents and therefore do many things. Current skills are media design, game design, and physics/math(yea don't ask).

To grab the code:
After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
